segments.text: Who wants to go first ? Lily ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh ... I mostly just like to listen . You're the groom . Why don't you go first ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK.Put on something by the Backstreet Boys !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about As Long as You Love Me ? You can pretend you're singing it to your fiancee Brooke !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd better not . Brooke hates the Backstreet Boys !
segments.speaker: S1
